name: Photography Event Ordering System

screenshots.caption: Admin side of the software.  This is the main menu.

short_description: The Photography Event Ordering System allows a photographer to easily publish and allow ordering of photography events such as wedding, graduations, etc. to the internet.  The photographer can create events and upload pictures associated with that event.
